tweets.content: @ekoner: In the joined up data standards session with Georg from @opencontracting, Seember from Budeshi amongst others #IODC16pic.twitter.com/P8gDbnNXgl

info: In this session, discussion focused on how to define standards so interoperability can be ensured, helping data to be used and reused, but also to help decision making, accountability and measuring.

session.description: Joined-up data standards: evidence of need and emerging solutions

conference_notes:
• Interoperability is key to help defining an standard
  • We need more standards not only for a better and fair use of data, but also to foster innovation
  • Procurement and open contracting need an standard to ensure accountability
name: Joined-up Data Standards: Evidence of Need and Emerging Solutions
